thread.title: New York AG calls the Weinstein company 'despicable'

title: New York AG calls the Weinstein company 'despicable'
text:
New York AG calls the Weinstein company 'despicable' Monday, February 12, 2018 - 01:29 
New York Attorney General Eric Schneiderman called the Weinstein Company 'despicable' on Monday in a news conference held to explain his decision to sue Harvey Weinstein and the Weinstein company over sexual harassment and misconduct allegations going back years. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
